## RpcReliabilityManager class

RPC可靠性管理器 提供重复检测、幂等性、顺序执行和事务支持

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class RpcReliabilityManager extends EventEmitter 
```
**Extends:** [EventEmitter](./ecs-framework-monorepo.eventemitter.md)
